alert.note: Alert for Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 6:35PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Big Horn and north central Sheridan Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 633 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 21 miles northeast of Sheridan, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail, along with very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Expect ponding of water on roads and in low lying areas. Localized flooding is possible due to the heavy rain. Locations impacted include... Tongue River Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
